overview: Dmitry Mozzhukhin's animated musical for the group "Give a Tank (!)", created by a team of independent artists in the period from 2016 to 2021. "Parasite Words" is a sound canvas based on samples of various household items recorded on a speech microphone given to us by a stranger on the street. "Parasite Words" is one 12-minute song consisting of 1,329 words.
title: Parasitic Words
